title: Richard Bandler - Creating Therapeutic Change
description:
Creating Therapuetic Change -Bandler DVD

Bandler considers this advanced seminar his best ever presentation of how to work with clients. Just solving problems often isn&#039;t enough. Time distinctions can be used to interlace beliefs, feeling states and chains into complexes that generatively reorganize fundamental attitudes throughout a person&#039;s life. Among the areas covered are: State preparation of the therapist. Noticing the information and presuppositions many people miss. Rehearsing backsliding to build presuppositions of success. Weaving "complexes" that go far beyond solving particular problems to changing fundamental attitudes.
